front.reference:
Proc Indian Natn Sci Acad 81 No. 1 February 2015 Special Issue, pp. 86-94
c
Printed in India.

docTitle.titlePart: QCD Thermodynamics at Finite Temperature and Finite Chemical Potential

byline.affiliation: Theory Division, Saha Institute of Nuclear Physics, 1/AF Bidhannagar,

front.div:
We calculate thermodynamic functions viz. pressure, change in pressure due to chemical potential, quark
number density of hot and dense nuclear matter at finite temperature and chemical potential using three-
loop Hard Thermal Loop perturbation theory.
front.keyword:
Key Words : Quantum Chromodynamics; Quark Gluon Plasma; Hard Thermal Loop Perturba-
tion Theory; Temperature; Chemical Potential
